item.title: The New Job Search
item.description: Molly Wendell is the author of the definitive book on job networking: “The New Job Search: Break all the rules. Get connected. And get hired faster for the money you’re worth.” She also maintains a blog of job-search tips called “Molly’s Blog.” Molly was once out of work for two years and three days—until she finally figured out NETWORKING was the key to landing a job. She then had more than 30 job offers in 90 days. Since then, Molly has helped thousands of people land jobs. She’s currently President of Executives Network, a networking group exclusively for executives in the job search.
